name: Hidden Dragon: Legend
description: Hidden Dragon is 2.5D action platformer taking place in Imperial China, combining classic platform action with fast-paced combo fighting, harkening back to classics like Ninja Gaiden, The Devil May Cry and Shinobi.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel i5 4460 / AMD FX8300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750TI / AMD(ATI) Radeon HD 5870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel i7 4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 390 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
